root.name: Assimilation
root.description: Assimilation is a game about dominance similar to othello, taking over the board with coloured marbles. To do this you must jump, teleport or clone your way over your opponents. There are ten game boards total of varying shapes with holes where the marbles sit (like chinese checkers). Play against the computer AI or up to 7 of your friends.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 95/98/ME/2000Processor: Pentium 2 @ 200 MHzMemory: 16 MBHard Drive: 20 MB FreeVideo Memory: 2 MBSound Card: Soundblaster CompatibleDirectX: 6.0
